#summary A tutorial to create Tesseract Engine 3.x .net wrapper.
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

A tutorial to create Tesseract Engine 3.x .net wrapper.

= Details =

*The current version supported to extract locations of detected characters. Also, you can run parallel for a set of images.*

Below is a quick tutorial:


* Note: Use [http://tesseract-ocr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sources]/[http://tesseract-ocr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/tessdata/ tessdata]/[http://tesseract-ocr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/vs2008/lib/ third party] from svn; [http://code.google.com/p/tesseract-ocr/ tesseract-ocr] version should be 3.01 r552

1.
Download all files at: [https://tesseractdotnet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dotnetwrapper/TesseractEngineWrapper TesseractEngineWrapper] 

    Merge downloaded files with your source code. *You can also do copy and override, if you make sure that your source code version is 3.01 r552.*



2.
Add two new files ([http://code.google.com/p/tesseractdotnet/source/browse/trunk/dotnetwrapper/TesseractEngineWrapper/tesseractenginewrapper.h tesseractenginewrapper.h] and [http://code.google.com/p/tesseractdotnet/source/browse/trunk/dotnetwrapper/TesseractEngineWrapper/tesseractenginewrapper.cpp tesseractenginewrapper.cpp]) to [http://code.google.com/p/tesseract-ocr/ tesseract project]


3.
Changed the project settings as belows:

    Configuration Type: *Dynamic Library (.dll)*

    Common Language Runtime Support: *Old Syntax (/clr:oldSyntax)*

    Output File: *tesseractengine3.dll*

    Also need to add *System, System.Drawing* assembly to *Common Properties\Framework and References*

4.
After that, apply building the project.



*Note:*
You can also find simple application at [https://tesseractdotnet.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dotnetwrapper dotnetwrapper]

If you use above application; you have to configure tesseract engine first (from *main menu >> tools >> options*), and copy Leptonica library to application path.
